title: Analyze Asset Failure Data
description: A reliability engineer is analyzing frequent failures of a specific type of gearbox to find the root cause and improve its maintenance strategy.

tasks.description: Retrieve all maintenance work orders for the specified gearbox model over the past 3 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a list of 25 work orders related to this gearbox type.

tasks.description: Analyze the work order descriptions and failure codes to categorize the reasons for failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's analysis shows that 80% of failures are due to 'bearing seizure'.

tasks.description: Based on the findings, update the preventative maintenance plan for the gearbox to include more frequent bearing lubrication and vibration analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a change request to update the asset's maintenance strategy.
